name: Nianzu Pun
story: Jiayi Jin is a skilled and experienced soldier who has specialized in missile systems and tactics. Born and raised in China, he joined the military straight out of high school and quickly rose through the ranks. He has been involved in several conflicts in Southeast Asia, and has earned a reputation as a dependable and technically proficient soldier. Although he is single and largely keeps to himself, he is respected by his fellow soldiers and is often called upon for his expertise.
